text: Sir Robert Helpmann (9 April 190928 September 1986) was an Australian dancer, actor, theatre director and choreographer. He was born in Mount Gambier, South Australia. Helpmann was known for his role as the Child Catcher in Chitty Chitty Bang Bang. Helpmann died on 28 September 1986 in Sydney from chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, aged 77. He was given a state funeral. In 1964, he was made a Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE). In 1965, he was named Australian of the Year, and in 1968, he was made a Knight Bachelor. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Actors from South Australia Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian dancers Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:Australian choreographers Category:Knights Bachelor Category:Australian theatre directors
title: Robert Helpmann
